meanings.definition: Obscene or indecent in a sexual way.
meanings.sent1: The movie had some smutty scenes that made me uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: She was disgusted by the smutty comments made by the comedian.
meanings.sent3: The smutty jokes at the party were not appreciated by everyone.
meanings.sent4: The smutty content of the magazine shocked the readers.
meanings.sent5: The smutty graffiti on the wall was quickly removed by the authorities.

meanings.sent1: After playing outside, the children's faces were smutty with dirt.
meanings.sent2: The old chimney sweep emerged from the fireplace with a smutty face.
meanings.sent3: The smutty windows of the abandoned house gave it a spooky look.
meanings.sent4: The smutty car looked like it hadn't been washed in years.
meanings.sent5: The smutty hands of the mechanic left marks on the clean paper.
